hero.backgroundImageAlt: Background image of mental health treatment facility
hero.textBox3: Clear Path's treatments address the root cause of anxiety, depression, ADHD, and PTSD symptoms.

about.textOne: specializing in medication management and mental health intervention services. With a focus on offering in-person care, Clear Path differentiates itself from telehealth-only providers by ensuring patients receive direct, face-to-face treatment from experienced psychiatrists and psychiatric physician assistants (PAs).

list.name: Veronica L.
list.text: Clearpath gave me the strength to overcome my anxiety. The compassionate therapists provided unwavering support, and I've found a renewed sense of purpose andtranquility in my life.

list.name: Pushpender Singh
list.text: Clearpath helped me regain control of my life. The personalized treatment plan and the caring staff made all the difference. I am now on a path to recovery and happiness.

list.title: Medication Management
list.description: Ongoing evaluation and adjustment of psychiatric medications to manage mental health conditions.

list.title: Transcranial Magnetic Stimulation (TMS)
list.description: A non-invasive procedure used to treat depression by stimulating nerve cells in the brain.

list.title: Spravato (Esketamine) Infusions
list.description: A cutting-edge treatment for treatment-resistant depression, administered under medical supervision.

programs.heading: Conditions Treated
programs.text: Clear Path focuses on addressing a wide range of mental health conditions through psychiatric care and medication management. The primary target conditions include:

services.heading: Services
services.description: Brand North offers a variety of additional services to support your recovery journey:

services.title: Medication-Assisted Treatment (MAT)
services.description: Plans to implement mental health outpatient care and psychiatric services, including medications such as Suboxone, Methadone, Vivitrol, and Subutex.

services.title: Sober Living Placement
services.description: Strong partnership with Sober Living ensures access to supportive, substance-free housing environments.

services.title: Transportation Coordination
services.description: Assistance in arranging transportation services to ensure clients can attend their sessions.

services.title: Nutritional Counseling
services.description: A nutritionist provides guidance on healthy eating habits and diet plans, with snacks and lunch available for full day treatment clients.

services.title: Case Management
services.description: Assistance with resume building, job search, court paperwork, and accessing community resources to help clients develop life skills and achieve long-term stability.

patientJourney.heading: Patient Journey and Process
patientJourney.imageAlt: Patient showing signs of distress while sitting with laptop

steps.title: Booking and Initial Assessment
steps.description: Patients can book appointments directly through the website using Zocdoc integration. New patients will undergo an initial assessment to establish care and begin treatment.

steps.title: Treatment Path
steps.description: Following the initial assessment, patients will receive ongoing medication management and, when necessary, be introduced to additional services like TMS or Spravato.

steps.title: Follow-up Appointments
steps.description: Patients will typically attend monthly in-person follow-up appointments to ensure progress and make medication adjustments as needed.

disorders.title: Person coping with PTSDEffective Strategies for Managing PTSD

faq.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subheading: Find answers to common questions about our services and support

faq.title: What is Medication-Assisted Treatment?
faq.details: Medication-Assisted Treatment (MAT) involves using medication, along with counseling and behavioral therapies, to treat substance use disorders.

faq.title: How does Sober Living Placement work?
faq.details: Sober Living Placement helps individuals find safe and supportive housing environments where they can continue their recovery journey.

faq.title: What services are included in Case Management?
faq.details: Case Management includes resume building, job search assistance, accessing community resources, and more.

insuranceOptions.description: We work with multiple insurance providers and healthcare networks to ensure accessible mental health care for our patients.

cta.heading: Ready to Start Your Journey to Better Mental Health?
cta.text: Take the first step towards healing. Our experienced team is here to support you with personalized, evidence-based treatment plans.
